name: Mastodon Full Image Preview and Wider Columns
description: Makes Mastodon's columns a bit wider and shows full media/image previews instead of Mastodon's default cropped previews. Customize Settings -Instance Domains- Don't forget to click on Customize Settings to specify your instance's domain! You can specify up to 10 custom Mastodon instances that you want styled. -Column Width- Mastodon's default column width of 350px is overriden to 400px by default with this user style. Under "Customize Settings", you may choose a different value (don't forget the 'px') for the width of the columns before clicking the install button. -Multiple Images- Specify whether images in toots with multiple images use the full width of the Mastodon column or to 2 images per row. --- Got comments?
